name: Ultima Online
description:
Ultima Online is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Origin Systems. It was originally released in 1997. It was published by Electronic Arts. On review aggregator Metacritic, Ultima Online has a score of 59. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Ultima Online is available on PC.
It was produced by Richard Garriott. Starr Long directed the game. It was scored by Hal Milton, Joe Basquez and Kirk Winterrowd.
